stateSensor.label: 4F_fire exhaust fan start and stop state
ID5_DI0 set air conditioning outdoor unit 1 start stop (state)
ID5_DI1 set air conditioning outdoor unit 2 start stop (status)
ID5_DI2 set air conditioning outdoor unit 3 start stop (state)
ID5_DI3 set air conditioning outdoor unit 4 start stop (state)
ID5_DI4 ice water pump 2 water switch
ID9_DI0 Ice water host 3 start stop (status)
ID9_DI4 cooling water tower 3 water flow switch
ID9_DI5 ice water pump 3 water switch
